Y mucho mas: And much more, at your fingertips
Para que aprendas: For you, to learn about this world
Puedes: You can add this product to the cart in the products section, this is the information about the product
Sobre nosotros parrafo: D.R Store Italia is a wellness store where all kinds of food and dietary supplements and related products are sold, as well as coffee powder, capsules and other products related to consumption. This store has the objective of making you consume much healthier foods or supplements for your workouts or diets, all this to improve your health. Versions of famous products such as chocolate bars or sweets and chocolate in a protein and improved version.
Contacto parrafo: We have different methods of contact
Contacto parrafo2: We also have a Customer Service, the hours are from Monday to Saturday from 9:00 a.m. to 1:30 p.m. and from 4:30 p.m. to 8:00 p.m. Within these hours you can request a real-time conversation with one of our agents, if you need information outside these hours you can fill out a form with your request.
¿No tienes cuenta?: You do not have an account?
El correo introducido no es valido: The email entered is not valid
El correo y la contrasena no coinciden: Email and password do not match
¿Ya tienes cuenta?: Do you already have an account?
El nick debe tener 4 caracteres o mas: The nickname must have 4 characters or more
El nombre debe tener 5 caracteres o mas: Name must be 5 characters or more
Recuerda introducir los apellidos: Remember to enter the last names
El domicilio debe tener 4 caracteres o m: Address must be 4 characters or more
El domicilio no puede tener más de 50 ca: The address cannot have more than 50 characters
The password must have between 8 and 16 characters and at least one uppercase, one lowercase and one number
